articles.author: Kumar Rupesh
articles.title: IND-C vs PAK-C live telecast: When and where to watch India vs Pakistan WCL final live on TV and online? - India TV News
articles.description: Skipper Yuvraj Singh hammered a quickfire 59 off 28 balls to help India Champions maul Australia Champions in the second semifinal of the World Championship of Legends. The southpaw smashed four boundaries and five sixes during his knock.
articles.content: After 17 pulsating contests, the World Championship of Legends has reached its final frontier and will witness India Champions take on Pakistan Champions in the summit clash on Saturday (July 13). Th… [+2922 chars]
